official_title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Lynnhaven Inlet, Bay, and connecting waters, Virginia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to pay the city of Virginia Beach, Virginia, $1,630,000 for remedial work to Long Creek Canal which the city did as a result of the navigation project for Lynnhaven Inlet, Bay, and connecting waters, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Lynnhaven Inlet, Bay, and connecting waters, Virginia.
